snippet.title: [11k Danoni] Possibling the Impossible (フロン / ラズベリル - Love & Justice)
snippet.description:
Yes, I know that "Possibling" is not an actual word, I just thought it would be funny

Anyways, yeah this was apparently supposed to be impossible? At least, the charter did not expect anyone to actually beat it! I actually thought it was impossible myself when I first saw this chart, but then I guess this happened LOL

To be honest, I didn't expect this to be my second 🟎4 clear at all! I thought my second would be Z◇D1AC S1GN or 11 in the ◇ since they did not seem like they are not as technical as the others in that difficulty and more focused on (I guess) strength? Especially since I was so close to beating those two as well! I'm not actually sure if the others in that difficulty are actually possible at all though RIP

Actually, I think this is like the fifth time I got a normal pass on this! I played this so many times because I wanted to record a video of the gameplay, but three of the times I got a pass when I was not recording! The other one I actually accidentally deleted when I was deleting video recordings because it looked like it won't be long before I run out of memory space! I should have watched the video beforehand, I thought it was one of my fails *SOB*
This one is not one of my personal best, but my arms are so tired! I won't be surprised if this game will cause me to get really strong arms LOL

I mean I guess it kind of worked out in the end because after that I found out how to have keyboard overlay for my gameplay! I thought it would be interesting to see what I was actually pressing when I was playing this chart! It also might give you a better idea of how 11k is supposed to be played! When I saw the keypresses though, it was actually kind of funny because I saw lots of bad habits, which is very typical of me! I'd still much rather have a live recording with my hands as well since the keyboard overlay is not enough for me to show the crosshands that I had to do in this chart! Granted, there's actually not many here, but it would still be nice! Too bad I don't actually know how to record just my hands and keyboard and not have the camera face me! Oh, here's the link to the keyboard overlay that I was using for this video!
https://sourceforge.net/projects/nohboard/

Also, it turns out that I can't use the same recording software (which pretty much came with Windows I think) that I have been using this whole time since it seemed like it was only recording one window. Because of this, I decided to use OBS! I'm... actually still not sure how to work with it yet RIP

I'm not too sure what the reason is, but when I viewed the recording, the volume is much lower than what I hear when I was playing, and certainly was lower than when I was using the old recording software! I actually ended up having to increase the volume to like 12dB in order for it to sound right for me! I hope the audio is fine now!

Oh right, I'm not sure if I like where I placed the keyboard overlay! I was thinking of making the keyboard overlay a bit larger, putting it in the middle of the playfield and making it a bit more transparent next time! Are you guys alright with where I placed it currently though?

As always, make sure to at least try to play the game or just play any 10+k game!!!! or else

Shorts ver: https://youtu.be/TnEvYydqFUY

#danoni

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~

Song: フロン / ラズベリル (BACO) - Love & Justice
Song Source: BMS
Maker: apoi
Chart Link: http://apoi108.sakura.ne.jp/danoni/apoi/no89_Love_Justice.html
